attributes.action: Immediate review of the Child Maintenance Service
attributes.additional_details: The current CMS model allows absent parents to hide income, evade monitoring, escape financial responsibility, and refuse to pay with minimal and/ or unacceptably late penalty. This not only forces the financial burden onto the resident parent and allows a dynamic of financial abuse, it disadvantages children and fails to protect them. The current system is flawed, outdated and is not fit for purpose, and is failing thousands of the parents and children it is meant to assist
attributes.background: Review, reform and update the way the Child Maintenance Service assesses, rewards, and monitors child maintenance, to eliminate the current loopholes and prevent the financial burden being placed onto the resident parent

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Review the child maintenance service
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702615
